zujkomiller.genetic.client
Class Genie

All Implemented Interfaces:
EvolutionObserver
public class Genie
extends java.lang.Object
implements EvolutionObserver

This is the main class used to start the program. Its main method should be passed the full path name to the .properties file which lists the parameters used to run the program.

Method Detail

generationCreated

public void generationCreated(Generation gen,
                              int topScoreSoFar,
                              boolean isLastGeneration,
                              EvolutionObservable observable)
This method is called by an EvolutionObservable when a new generations has been created and tested for fitness.
Specified by:
generationCreated in interface EvolutionObserver
Parameters:
generation - The generation that was just created.
generationNumber - The number of the generation (ex: if this is the second generation created, the generationNumber will be 2).
topScoreSoFar - The top score achieved so far by any Chromosome in any generation.
isLastGeneration - This will be true only when no other generations will be created after the one passed in as a param.
observabe - The EvoluitonObservable object which called this method. It can be queried for more information.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
